code: import*as actionTypes from"./actionTypes";export var onShowInfo=function onShowInfo(){return{type:actionTypes.SHOW_INFO_BASKET};};export var onProductAddedToBasket=function onProductAddedToBasket(producto){return{type:actionTypes.ADD_TO_BASKET,producto:producto};};export var onGettingTotalPrice=function onGettingTotalPrice(basket){return{type:actionTypes.GET_TOTAL_PRICE,basket:basket};};export var onRemoveFromBasket=function onRemoveFromBasket(modelo,precio){return{type:actionTypes.REMOVE_FROM_BASKET,modelo:modelo,precio:precio};};export var onLoading=function onLoading(){return{type:actionTypes.ON_LOADING};};export var onCreateOrder=function onCreateOrder(order){return{type:actionTypes.CREATE_ORDER,order:order};};export var onSelectFormaDePago=function onSelectFormaDePago(formaDePago,basket){return{type:actionTypes.FORMA_DE_PAGO,formaDePago:formaDePago,basket:basket};};export var onSelectFormaDeEnvio=function onSelectFormaDeEnvio(formaDeEnvio){return{type:actionTypes.FORMA_DE_ENVIO,formaDeEnvio:formaDeEnvio};};export var onProvinciaSelected=function onProvinciaSelected(provincia){return{type:actionTypes.PROVINCIA_SELECTED,provincia:provincia};};export var unmountCarrito=function unmountCarrito(){return{type:actionTypes.UNMOUNT_CARRITO};};
